```{r}
library(keras)

dense_model <- keras_model_sequential() %>%
  layer_embedding(
    input_dim = max_words + 1,
    output_dim = 12,
    input_length = max_length
  ) %>%
  layer_flatten() %>%
  layer_dense(units = 32, activation = "relu") %>%
  layer_dense(units = 1, activation = "sigmoid")

dense_model

dense_model %>% compile(
  optimizer = "adam",
  loss = "binary_crossentropy",
  metrics = c("accuracy")
)
```
